DOC.brief_summary: This study observational study design determine extent gastrointestinal ( GI ) post-procedure complication Radiofrequency Catheter Ablation ( RFCA ) atrial fibrillation ( AF ) . This exploratory study evaluate patient symptom prior RFCA procedure , 1 month post RFCA procedure , 3 month post RFCA procedure , administration questionnaire . The purpose study determine vagus nerve injury result RFCA AF increase risk post-procedure GI complication may present temporary permanent symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Vagus Nerve Injury Post Radiofrequency Catheter Ablation Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Patients verify medical history atrial fibrillation . Male female > 18 year age . Patients schedule RFCA procedure , subsequent failure one Antiarrhythmic Drug ( AAD class I , III IV ) , ablation . Ability answer question pose questionnaire . Ability understand sign write informed consent form , must obtain prior initiation study procedure .
